thread.title: Region's diesel prices below petrol for first time in 15 years
thread.title_full: Region's diesel prices below petrol for first time in 15 years | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Region's diesel prices below petrol for first time in 15 years
text:
Play video Drivers of diesel cars have plenty to smile about tonight after prices fell below petrol for the first time in 15 years.
Morrisons sparked a supermarket forecourt war after it cut the price of diesel by up to two pence a litre. Tesco, Asda and Sainsbury's have all followed suit.
Diesel is normally more expensive than petrol. But lower wholesale costs has led to savings being passed on at the pumps. Our transport correspondent Mike Pearse reports.
Last updated Tue 21 Jul 2015 Travel
